item.rel_title: WeChat, a Chinese social media, may early detect the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak in 2019
item.rel_abs: We plotted daily data on the frequencies of keywords related to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) from WeChat, a Chinese social media. Using 'Feidian', Chinese abbreviation for SARS, may detect the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak in 2019 two weeks earlier. WeChat offered a new approach to early detect disease outbreaks.
item.rel_authors: Wang, W.; Wang, Y.; Zhang, X.; Li, Y.; Jia, X.; Dang, S.
